description:
I reverted the earlier attempt at fixing this which you LGTM'ed https://codereview.chromium.org/11000042,
because the ShowWithWindowState function when called with SHOWNORMAL initially hides the window and then
shows it causing an ugly flicker every time you click on the window.

I reworked the change to call AdjustFrameForImmersiveMode followed by the ShowWindow API in 
the BrowserFrameWin::Activate function for metro mode. This ensures that the window correctly continues to
have keyboard focus.

BUG=151136
R=sky
Committed: https://src.chromium.org/viewvc/chrome?view=rev&revision=159372
